header_text: Every Monday you call your parent to say hello. Today is Monday, and they did not pick up the phone when you called, which is unusual. Your parent probably did not answer the phone because they are busy.

elements.Text: Is your parent unable to talk because they are ill?

elements.name: Every Monday you call your parent to say hello. Today is Monday, and they did not pick up the phone when you called, which is unusual. Your parent probably did not answer the phone because they are busy._Family & Home Life_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
